title: AI models outperform traditional climate predictions, offering new insights for coral reef futures
description: A new study led by the Wildlife Conservation Society (WCS) finds that artificial intelligence (AI) models are providing more accurate and more hopeful predictions for the future of coral reefs amid climate change. Findings show that while many reefs face serious risks and degradation, others may remain stable or even recover, especially where local management reduces pressures like overfishing, water pollution, and coastal degradation.
content: A new study led by the Wildlife Conservation Society (WCS) finds that artificial intelligence (AI) models are providing more accurate and more hopeful predictions for the future of coral reefs amid climate change. Findings show that while many reefs ... [2703 chars]

title: Gold is suddenly going through a correction. Is the metal's bull run in danger?
description: Gold's bull run this year has trounced even the artificial intelligence trade that propelled stock to all-time highs. It's now buckling a bit.
content: Gold's bull run this year has trounced even the artificial intelligence trade that drove stocks to all-time highs. The precious metal is now buckling a bit. Futures tied to the precious metal fell more than 1% on Wednesday, one day after plunging 5.7... [2033 chars]

title: Meta cuts 600 workers in AI unit as it races to compete in tech boom
description: Meta is cutting roughly 600 positions in its artificial intelligence unit, in a reorganization of its workforce to better compete in the global AI race.
content:

title: Meta to Cut Around 600 Roles in Superintelligence Labs AI Unit
description: The job cuts will affect Facebook Artificial Intelligence Research (FAIR) unit, as well as teams focused on product-related AI and AI infrastructure
content:
Meta is cutting around 600 positions out of the several thousand roles in its Superintelligence Labs, the Facebook owner said on Wednesday as it looks to make its artificial intelligence unit more flexible and responsive.

title: Vishal Patel tracked stock portfolios in Grade 9. Now, he oversees more than $8-billion in assets
description: We asked the senior portfolio manager at Dynamic Funds how he plays the artificial intelligence theme and why he likes Dollarama

title: Applied Digital signs $5 billion AI infrastructure lease with hyperscaler
description: Applied Digital has secured a significant $5 billion lease agreement for 200 megawatts of artificial intelligence compute capacity in North Dakota. This deal, spanning approximately 15 years, underscores the company's expansion to meet growing demand for AI infrastructure. The agreement boosts Applied Digital's total leased capacity in the state to 600 megawatts.
